title: For Some Reason, My Ex-girlfriend, Who Lost Interest in Me, and My Current Girlfriend, Whom I’ve Known Since Childhood, Are Now Fighting Over Me - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Bullying   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Clingy Lover   Clumsy Love Interests   Cold Love Interests   First Love   Forced into a Relationship   Kuudere   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Love Triangles   Male Protagonist   Mismatched Couple   Misunderstandings   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Persistent Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Pretend Lovers   Tsundere   Younger Brothers
author: 急川回レ
description:
The coolest girl in school, Shizuku Natsukawa, has an elementary school level love deviation score!?

Shizuku Natsukawa, the most talented girl in the school, falls in love with Shota Komori, who is her fake boyfriend to ward off men, and says–“Our relationship ends today (Translation: Let’s be real lovers)!” A spinning love comedy with Natsukawa-san, whose love deviation score is too low!>
